title: "Amazon’s New Language Model AlexaTM 20B Beats GPT-3 on NLP Benchmarks"
excerpt: "Unlike OpenAI’s GPT-3 or Google’s PaLM, which are decoder-only models, AlexaTM 20B is a seq2seq model that contains an encoder and a decoder allowing better performance on machine translation (MT) and summarization."
